name: Birdcakes
description: "Ptooey! Ptooey! Ptooey!” - That´s the glorious sound of bullets in this 2D shooter platformer! Step in a world of state-of-the-art Cupcakes weaponry! After a picnic went horribly wrong, Pancake the Cupcake desperately tries to fend off hungry flies away from his girlfriend Cherry!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 9, 10. Processor: 1.0 GHz or faster for a good baking. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: No thanks.
